thread.title: Girl's High School Basketball Media Day

title: Girl's High School Basketball Media Day
text:
Girl's High School Basketball Media Day 
By Kayla Crandall -21Alive October 14, 2015 Updated Oct 14, 2015 at 7:39 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (21Alive) -- High School football may still be on everyone's mind, but basketball season is just round the corner. 
Wednesday evening was the area's High School Girl's Basketball Media Day held at North Side High School. 
Sports Director Tommy Schoegler sat down with area players and coaches to get a feel for how the upcoming season will play out.   To submit a comment on this article, your email address is required. We respect your privacy and your email will not be visible to others nor will it be added to any email lists. Most Viewed
